summary: Adds an unenchanted version of the Ebony Mail which is craftable, improvable and enchantable in the same way as normal Ebony Armour.
descriptionHtml:
[font=\"Palatino Linotype\"]
[color=#FFFF00][size=3][B]DESCRIPTION[/B][/size][/color]

This mod adds the Ebony Mail as a craftable armour.

- The special \"poison cloak\" etc Daedric enchantments are removed from the craftable version, so the true Daedric artifact \"Ebony Mail\" remains unique.

- Fully craftable, improvable and enchantable (has the same crafting requirements as regular Ebony Armour).

- Item has all the same base stats as the Daedric artifact Ebony Mail, the only changes I have made are removing the special enchantments, and classifying it as a regular set of armour for the purposes of selling to merchants.

(Made by request for Dextradamusz)




[color=#FFFF00][size=3][B]INSTALL[/B][/size][/color]

Either use Nexus Mod Manager or download the zip file manually and extract all of its contents to the Skyrim \"Data\" directory.[/font]
author: tetradite
